title: Employee Handbook (Public)
text: All employees are entitled to 20 days of annual leave. Office hours are 9am to 5pm. Contact HR for questions.

title: Finance Budget Q4 (Sensitive)
text: Projected spend for Q4 is $1.2M. Department allocations: Engineering $600k, Sales $300k, Operations $300k.

title: Salary Bands 2025 (Highly Sensitive)
text: Salary bands by level: L1 $60k-$80k, L2 $80k-$110k, L3 $110k-$150k. Access restricted to managers and HR.
